title: Big Daddy
writer: Steve Franks, Tim Herlihy, Adam Sandler
short_cast: Adam Sandler, Joey Lauren Adams, Jon Stewart, Cole Sprouse, Dylan Sprouse, Josh Mostel, Leslie Mann, Allen Covert, Rob Schneider, Kristy Swanson
cast: Adam Sandler, Joey Lauren Adams, Jon Stewart, Cole Sprouse, Dylan Sprouse, Josh Mostel, Leslie Mann, Allen Covert, Rob Schneider, Kristy Swanson
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 13 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 13
desc: Sonny, who's been slacking since law school, gets a crash course in personal responsibility when he suddenly finds himself taking care of a 5-year-old.
